SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util

Class SpigotAdapter

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.SpigotAdapter
public final class SpigotAdapter extends Object
Class that contains utility methods to convert between AnimatedArchitecture and Spigot objects.

For example, getBukkitWorld(IWorld) converts an IWorld to a World and wrapWorld(World) can be used to do the opposite.

  • Method Details

    • getBukkitWorld

      @Nullable public static @Nullable org.bukkit.World getBukkitWorld(IWorld world)
      Converts an IWorld object to a World object.

      If the ILocation is an WorldSpigot, only a simple cast is performed. Otherwise, a new World is constructed.

      Parameters:
      world - The AnimatedArchitecture world.
      Returns:
      The Spigot world.

    • getBukkitLocation

      public static org.bukkit.Location getBukkitLocation(ILocation location)
      Converts an ILocation object to a Location object.

      If the ILocation is an LocationSpigot, only a simple cast is performed. Otherwise, a new Location is constructed.

      Parameters:
      location - The AnimatedArchitecture location.
      Returns:
      The Spigot location.
